content: Trump is why I decided to tackle climate change by myself. I created a design project that integrates a surplus voluntary carbon offset into the product that takes care of more CO2 than is emitted in the creation of the product. It’s called the South Bowl and it’s up on Kickstarter. Here’s a link: http://kck.st/2o1kJEp We need to lead by action and there are many thing we can do as individuals that can help in the fight against climate change. Here is a by no means exhaustive list if things you can do to start: • eat less meat • drive less • recycle • insulate your home + use LED’s for light • vote for people that don’t deny climate change That last bit, is how we get the government to start working for us again.
